alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 10:18PM EST until January 17 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Fluvanna and Western Louisa Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Additional power outages are possible due to the combination of wintry precipitation and wind gusts up to 30 mph.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Virginia, please call 5 1 1.
